title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Build your first GraphRAG Powered Agent! (No Graph Expert Required) | Databases for AI

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this AWS Events video demonstrates how to build a GraphRAG-powered knowledge graph in an afternoon to unlock information trapped in docs, PDFs, and wikis so models can reason over it. The session features a live demo on real documents and emphasizes you don't need six months or graph expertise to get started.
bullets: Shows how knowledge graphs unlock information in docs, PDFs, and wikis so AI can reason over it.
Claims a practical build can be completed in an afternoon using the same AI tools teams already use.
No graph expert required—aims to lower the barrier to adoption.
Live demo using real documents to illustrate the approach.
Positions the workflow as a faster alternative to long, multi-month projects.
takeaways: If your organization’s technical documents, PDFs, and wikis contain critical knowledge, a knowledge graph can make that information accessible to AI-driven workflows.
The described approach suggests a much shorter implementation timeline (an afternoon) versus traditional multi-month projects, potentially reducing time-to-value.
Requiring no specialized graph expertise lowers the adoption barrier for teams that want to enhance AI reasoning over internal documents.
A live-demo focus indicates the method is practical and intended for real-world document sets rather than purely theoretical design.

items.title: Watch Live: Fed Chair Jerome Powell Holds News Conference | WSJ

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell speaks to reporters following the Fed's two-day policy-setting meeting. The video is WSJ News live coverage of his news conference.
bullets: Jerome Powell addresses reporters after the Federal Reserve's two-day policy-setting meeting.
This is a WSJ News live video of the ensuing news conference.
No transcript is available for the video.
The event follows the Fed's policy meeting on Jan 27, 2026.
takeaways: Use the live news conference as a primary source for any official Fed statements from the meeting.
Have finance and treasury teams on alert to review Fed communications promptly.
Ensure market-monitoring and risk-management systems are ready to log and respond to any market reactions.
Record and archive the remarks for internal review and scenario planning.

items.title: Deutsche Bank accelerates Cloud journeys with Google Cloud Consulting

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Google Cloud Consulting worked with Deutsche Bank to build a Cloud Engineering Program that used Generative AI to create personalized, interactive training for thousands of engineers. The program combined on-demand convenience with instructor-led effectiveness, with consulting providing the creative innovation and technical expertise to accelerate Deutsche Bank's cloud journey.
bullets: Google Cloud Consulting designed novel learning experiences for Deutsche Bank.
Generative AI powered personalized, interactive training content.
Training blended on-demand learning with instructor-led sessions.
Program trained thousands of engineers to become fluent in cloud engineering.
Consulting supplied creative innovation and technical expertise to speed cloud adoption.
takeaways: Investing in AI-driven, scalable training can materially accelerate cloud adoption timelines.
Personalized, interactive learning shortens skills gaps and increases engineer fluency faster than one-size-fits-all approaches.
A hybrid on-demand plus instructor-led model balances flexibility with effectiveness for enterprise teams.
Partnering with cloud consulting teams brings both creative design and technical execution needed for large-scale upskilling.

items.title: Year-end toolkit: Strengthening audit committee collaboration

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This PwC episode in the Year-end toolkit series focuses on how finance teams can strengthen collaboration with audit committees during the year-end accounting and reporting process. It highlights streamlined reporting and governance engagement while addressing emerging topics such as AI oversight (risks, opportunities, controls), enterprise risk management, cyber risk in the age of AI, and elevating proxy disclosures.
bullets: 1:18 – Strengthening management/audit committee communication and collaboration
10:10 – Key year-end accounting and reporting issues finance teams should be ready to address
15:02 – Oversight of AI: risks, opportunities, and controls
21:33 – Enhancing enterprise risk oversight
27:35/36:05 – Navigating evolving cyber risk in the age of AI and elevating proxy disclosures
takeaways: Ensure audit committees receive clear briefings on AI-related risks, controls, and potential financial impacts to support oversight.
Prepare year-end reporting to explicitly address transformation initiatives and their accounting implications for governance review.
Prioritize cyber risk controls and disclosure practices given AI-driven threat dynamics and the audit committee’s expanding oversight role.
Integrate enterprise risk management updates into audit committee communications to align operational resilience with financial reporting.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video highlights Jo discovering the power of Copilot Groups and shows that route planning can be made easy. It positions Microsoft Copilot and AI as tools for simplifying route and coordination tasks.
bullets: Jo discovers Copilot Groups
Core message: route planning made easy
Showcases Microsoft Copilot as an AI tool
Uses hashtags: #copilot #microsoftcopilot #ai
takeaways: Highlights Copilot Groups' applicability to route planning—relevant for field crew routing and outage response coordination.
Suggests evaluating Copilot integration with existing dispatch or workflow systems for operational planning.
Short, demo-style content could be useful for quick internal briefings or pilot trials to show capabilities to stakeholders.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description, podcast guests Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska discuss how AI is already integrated into audit work, supporting repetitive tasks, analysis of large data sets and better decision-making. They describe practical tools (e.g., AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI, KPMG Clara) and address shifts such as moving from sampling to full-population analysis, changing auditor roles, data security and regulatory challenges.
bullets: AI supports repetitive audit tasks and large-scale data analysis to inform decisions.
Tools highlighted: AI Transaction Scoring Tool (full-population analysis) and Clara AI (conversational assistant and specialist agents).
KPMG Clara platform enables real-time audit management and Clara for Clients improves client communication.
Shift from sampling to analysis of full populations changes audit approach and auditor roles.
Key implementation issues: auditor adaptation, data security, regulatory environment and potential AI-related risks.
takeaways: Expect audits to rely more on full-population analytics—ensure your systems can provide comprehensive, high-quality data exports for automated analysis.
Real-time audit platforms and client-facing AI tools can streamline compliance reporting—evaluate integration and access workflows with auditors.
Prioritize data security and regulatory compliance when adopting AI-driven audit processes to mitigate risks and meet oversight requirements.
Invest in staff skills and processes to work alongside AI tools, as auditor roles will evolve toward interpretation and oversight of automated analyses.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the trailer highlights support for NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The trailer footage was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield is a 3D real-time strategy RPG that has officially launched.
The launch trailer emphasizes NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation (MFG).
Footage was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings with DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Description links to the game site and official social channels for Arknights: Endfield.
Trailer published by the NVIDIA GeForce channel with related hashtags (#ArknightsEndfield, #RTXOn, #DLSS4).
takeaways: DLSS 4 MFG is being adopted in new game releases—verify compatibility with hardware (e.g., GeForce RTX 5080) if supporting game streaming or hosted gaming services.
4K Ultra captures using DLSS 4 MFG indicate test scenarios to include in benchmarking for cloud gaming and remote-rendering workloads.
Ensure driver, SDK, and platform support for DLSS 4 and MFG when planning upgrades or procurement for GPU-accelerated services.
Update performance monitoring and cost/performance assessments to account for DLSS 4 MFG rendering modes used in client workloads.
